text: enave (ivvamanitattirku maru ceyyum) munahpikkana an; kalaiyum;, munahpikkana penkalaiyum;, musrikkana ankalaiyum, musrikkana penkalaiyum niccayamaka allah vetanai ceyvan; (anal ivvamanitattai matittu natakkum) muhminana ankalaiyum, muhminana penkalaiyum (avarkal tavpavai erru) mannikkinran. Allah mika mannippavan; mikka anputaiyavan
